title: Elegant Diamond-Studded Gold Chain (Thadu)
materials: Gross weight 20.990 gms. Features a fine
features: Delicate, interconnected gold chain design with interspersed diamond studs. Each diamond stud is securely set in a bezel setting, ensuring maximum brilliance and durability. The chain offers a modern minimalist aesthetic suitable for both traditional and contemporary wardrobes.
occasions: gifting. Also suitable for simple rituals or smaller family functions (Sanna Sambaram).
description: A perfect blend of simplicity and elegance. The 22K gold provides a rich, warm tone that complements any skin tone, while the diamond accents add a touch of sophistication. The lightweight design makes it comfortable for everyday wear. Durable construction ensures longevity. A valuable investment piece suitable for gifting.
